title: Yukon Gear & Axle (YZLD44-3-30) 30-Spline Zip Locker for Dana 44 with 3.73 & Downward Axle Ratio
description: The Zip Locker from Yukon is an air operated locker that provides complete traction on-the-fly. This selectable locker features exceptional strength in both internal gears and case, and provides ultimate convenience for switching in and out of lockup. Great for both off-road and on-road usage.
